translation.en: Fuck!
translation.zh: 操！

translation.en: Skateboarding has gotten me through everything I've ever experienced in my life.
translation.zh: 玩滑板使我挺过了生活中遇到的一切困难

translation.en: People are like, "Are you Lacey Baker?" And I'm like, "Yeah."
translation.zh: 别人问：“你是莱茜·贝克吗？”我说：“嗯”

translation.en: It's pretty crazy.
translation.zh: 很夸张

translation.en: I fully can't even, like, look at footage of me from, like, age 13 to, like, 18.
translation.zh: 我13岁到18岁的视频我自己真的看不下去

translation.en: Lacey Baker was this fucking person that got put together
translation.zh: 莱茜·贝克 是我周围的世界生造出来的一个人

translation.en: by just the world around me.
translation.zh: 是我周围的世界生造出来的一个人

translation.en: I had to, like, become this person
translation.zh: 我必须成为这个人

translation.en: and then having all of my dreams riding on that.
translation.zh: 然后将我所有的梦想建于其上

translation.en: How could somebody not choose that?
translation.zh: 谁会不这样选择呢？

translation.en: [sportscaster 1] She's been a dominant force in women's skateboarding for a very long time.
translation.zh: 她成为女子滑板界的主导力量已经很久

translation.en: [sportscaster 2] You just don't see anybody else doing what Baker's doing.
translation.zh: 贝克的动作 其他人做不出来

translation.en: [sportscaster 3] Lacey Baker's first ever gold medal.
translation.zh: 莱茜·贝克人生第一块金牌

translation.en: [sportscaster 4] Seven X Games medals.
translation.zh: 七块世界极限运动会奖牌

translation.en: Super Crown champion 2016 and 2017.
translation.zh: 2016年及2017年超级皇冠冠军

translation.en: A legend in women's skateboarding.
translation.zh: 女子滑板界的传奇

translation.en: [skater] Do you think you could, uh, drop in on here
translation.zh: 你能不能在这里下板

translation.en: and do like two kickflips before you… before you got to there?
translation.zh: 然后做两个尖翻 再到那边？

translation.en: Oh my God. Okay, challenge accepted.
translation.zh: 天哪！好的 接受挑战

translation.en: Have you ever tried that in like a… in like a ramp
translation.zh: 你有没有试过在弧面做这个动作？

translation.en: where you try to drop in and do a trick on the flatbottom?
translation.zh: 然后下板之后在平底做一个动作？

translation.en: -[chuckling] No. -It's like a recipe for disaster. [laughs]
translation.zh: -没有-铁定会悲剧

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [Baker] I really became obsessed with skating once I started trying to land a kickflip.
translation.zh: 当我开始尝试尖翻落地的时候我立刻迷上了滑板

translation.en: What is happening?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I remember when I finally landed it, my whole world just, like, exploded.
translation.zh: 我记得当我终于成功落地的时候 我的整个世界像爆炸了似的

translation.en: It was so like-- Just that feeling.
translation.zh: 那种感觉真是太好了

translation.en: And I still get that feeling whenever I learn a new trick.
translation.zh: 每当我学会新的技巧 我还是会有那种感觉

translation.en: It never goes away.
translation.zh: 那种感觉永远不会消失

translation.en: -[cameraman chuckles] -I fucking did a front crook!
translation.zh: 我他妈做成了前桥板头滑行！

translation.en: Oh my God! [laughs]
translation.zh: 神啊！

translation.en: The last time I tried that shit, I was like 16 at Westco Park.
translation.zh: 上次尝试这个动作的时候我16岁 在维斯科公园

translation.en: -Just… Whoom! -[cameraman] Yeah.
translation.zh: -这样-嗯

translation.en: And then I was like, "Nope. I'm not doing that trick in my life."
translation.zh: 当时我心想：“免了我这辈子再也不做这个动作了”

translation.en: -Oh my God. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -神啊！-嗯

translation.en: -What, did you get rub in it? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你在里面加润滑油了吗？-嗯

translation.en: [sportscaster 1] Skateboarding hits the big stage in Tokyo.
translation.zh: 滑板在东京登上大舞台

translation.en: [sportscaster 2] Right. Skateboarding is finally coming to the Olympics.
translation.zh: 没错 滑板终于进入奥运

translation.en: [sportscaster 3] It's a substantial milestone for a sport
translation.zh: 对于25年前还被视作非主流的运动来说

translation.en: that 25 years ago was considered anything but mainstream.
translation.zh: 对于25年前还被视作非主流的运动来说 这是一座意义深远的里程碑

translation.en: -How's it going? -Good. Good to see you.
translation.zh: -怎么样？-很好

translation.en: Yeah, you too.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你-我也是

translation.en: -[skater] How you doing? -Good. How are you?
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你-嗯 我也是

translation.en: -You been good? -[Baker] What's up?
translation.zh: -还好吗？-你好

translation.en: So we're here today for the USA National Team announcement.
translation.zh: 我们今天来到这里宣布美国国家队的组成名单

translation.en: These skaters, through their own dedication to something that they love,
translation.zh: 这些滑板手热爱滑板运动并为之作出奉献

translation.en: have now provided themselves an opportunity to get the Olympics in Tokyo 2020.
translation.zh: 为自己争取到了参加2020年东京奥运会的机会

translation.en: [Baker] It's the first time skateboarding ever has been in the Olympics,
translation.zh: 这是滑板史上第一次进入奥运会

translation.en: so I want to make it there.
translation.zh: 所以我要争取参加奥运会

translation.en: [Jenn] Still can't really believe it to see how far skateboarding has come.
translation.zh: 还是不敢相信滑板运动取得了这么巨大的发展

translation.en: So this even being an opportunity is insane.
translation.zh: 有这样一个机会真是太可不可思议了

translation.en: [Josh] Alexis Sablone.
translation.zh: 亚历克西丝·萨博隆

translation.en: [Alexis] It's the ultimate competition. It's a huge honor.
translation.zh: 这是终极比赛 是非常大的荣誉

translation.en: So yeah, I mean, I think I would regret it forever
translation.zh: 嗯 所以如果我不全力以赴争取参加奥运会

translation.en: if I didn't try as hard as I could to get there.
translation.zh: 我应该会抱憾终身

translation.en: But it's weird,
translation.zh: 但这也很奇怪

translation.en: and how it will change skateboarding is a question mark.
translation.zh: 这将如何改变滑板 还要打一个问号

translation.en: [Josh] Next up, Lacey Baker.
translation.zh: 下一位 莱茜·贝克

translation.en: Another veteran of the women's contest scene.
translation.zh: 女子赛场上的又一位老将

translation.en: [Baker] It's a pretty historic event.
translation.zh: 这是一个历史事件

translation.en: Lacey has been seen putting it down for years.
translation.zh: 莱茜致力于滑板运动多年

translation.en: [Baker] You have to qualify to make it,
translation.zh: 要通过资格赛才能进

translation.en: so there's gonna be a lot of competing.
translation.zh: 所以会有很激烈的竞争

translation.en: It just makes me feel nervous.
translation.zh: 让我感到很紧张

translation.en: So, congratulations.
translation.zh: 祝贺你

translation.en: -Yay. -[audience cheering]
translation.zh: 好哎！

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Josh] …see what you're gonna do.
translation.zh: …看看你们能有如何的表现

translation.en: These are your 2019 USA Skateboarding Women's National Team.
translation.zh: 2019年美国滑板女子国家队人员名单宣布完毕

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [man] I definitely saw Leo as very talented early on.
translation.zh: 我很早就看出里奥非常有天赋

translation.en: You could tell that there was… there was a determination there that was beyond his years.
translation.zh: 看得出他超越自己年龄的决心

translation.en: [Alexis] Lee is one of the most skilled people on a skateboard.
translation.zh: 里是滑板界技术最高超的人之一

translation.en: They do riskier tricks that are, for most of us, like,
translation.zh: 他为我们表演风险更大的动作

translation.en: no one can do that first try.
translation.zh: 没人能一次就做成

translation.en: No one's trying to do that in a competition.
translation.zh: 没人会在比赛中尝试这样的动作

translation.en: [man 2] There's a lot of confidence in the tricks,
translation.zh: 做这些动作需要充足的自信

translation.en: but also, there's a lot of technical skill
translation.zh: 但也对技术的要求非常高

translation.en: threading tricks together, like, one really powerful flip trick
translation.zh: 将各种动作串在一起 比如一个非常强有力的翻板动作

translation.en: and then a really hard manual trick.
translation.zh: 然后接一个很难的后轮滑行

translation.en: It's a very specific style of skateboarding,
translation.zh: 这是一种特定的滑板风格

translation.en: and it's one that requires crazy perseverance.
translation.zh: 对于毅力的要求极高

translation.en: [skater] Leo's consistent because he practices a lot.
translation.zh: 里奥表现一贯出色 因为他练得多

translation.en: Seeing him try a trick for two hours,
translation.zh: 看到他练一个技巧就花上两小时

translation.en: it's kind of inspiring to see someone skate like that.
translation.zh: 令人感到非常鼓舞

translation.en: You have to have mind and skill.
translation.zh: 心态和技术都要好

translation.en: Like, you have to be one with your board,
translation.zh: 要人板合一

translation.en: so you can flip it, catch it, land in the manual,
translation.zh: 这样才能翻板 接住然后后轮滑行成功落地

translation.en: -and then flip it back out. -[filmer] Whoo!
translation.zh: 然后再完成翻板

translation.en: [Neen] You know? And that takes a lot of mind power. That's like what Lee does.
translation.zh: 这需要很强的精神力量 里就能做到

translation.en: [Josh] We're looking forward to watching their level of skating continue to increase.
translation.zh: 我们期待看到他们的滑板水平继续提高

translation.en: -I love you. -I love you too, Mom.
translation.zh: -我爱你-我也爱你 妈

translation.en: -[Josh] On with the guys. -All right. That's for you.
translation.zh: -和大家一起-这是给你的

translation.en: -Yay, another for me. -Yeah, that prize is for Mom right there.
translation.zh: -好哎 我又有了一个-对 给妈妈一个大奖

translation.en: [Leo] It would be really special for a person like me
translation.zh: 成为全球瞩目的酷儿

translation.en: just to be visibly queer on such a global scale,
translation.zh: 对我这样的人来说非常特别

translation.en: but also, being trans,
translation.zh: 同时我还是跨性别者

translation.en: I feel really out of place, um, in that setting.
translation.zh: 在那样的场景下 我感到格格不入

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: [Leo] You know what I was thinking about?
translation.zh: 知道我在想什么吗？

translation.en: Putting a desk in here and making that into a living room.
translation.zh: 在这里放一张桌子 把那里变成客厅

translation.en: [sighs] The never-ending… [chuckles] …home-improvement project.
translation.zh: 永无止境的家装改善工程

translation.en: Well, here's why it's an improvement, because I think it'd be…
translation.zh: 确实是改善 因为我觉得一定…

translation.en: [Leo] It's really important to be with someone who, like, really understands you.
translation.zh: 和理解自己的人在一起 非常重要

translation.en: Mel is one of the most kind, loving, and supportive people I've ever met in my life.
translation.zh: 梅尔是我这辈子见过最善良、最有爱最支持我的人之一

translation.en: Wait, so we'd get rid of your desk.
translation.zh: 等等 这么说我们要扔掉你的桌子

translation.en: Well, my desk is an amplifier with a piece of wood on it.
translation.zh: 我桌上再加一块木头就成放大器了

translation.en: -So, that's not really a desk. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 所以这算不上桌子

translation.en: -Okay. And then… -[chuckling continues]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [Mel] I'm not involved in the skate world at all,
translation.zh: 我完全不参与滑板的事

translation.en: and until I met Lee, I didn't know anything.
translation.zh: 在认识里之前 我对此一无所知

translation.en: But we had so much fun together.
translation.zh: 但我们在一起很开心

translation.en: He was just really easy to get close with immediately.
translation.zh: 他很容易相处

translation.en: [Donna] There. You think you're gonna come?
translation.zh: 你会来吗？

translation.en: Yeah, Lee will be there.
translation.zh: 嗯 里会去

translation.en: [clears throat] I think I get in on… maybe like the first.
translation.zh: 我可能第一个上

translation.en: Because I have to shoot, um, a skate video thing.
translation.zh: 因为我得拍一段滑板视频

translation.en: And then… then it's just the contest weekend, so…
translation.zh: 然后是比赛周末

translation.en: [Donna] You're coming in on the 26th--
translation.zh: 你会在26号来…

translation.en: [Leo] In the industry, I've always been known as Lacey Baker.
translation.zh: 在行内 大家都叫我莱茜·贝克

translation.en: With close friends and family, I prefer to be called Leo.
translation.zh: 和亲朋好友一起我更希望被称呼为“里奥”

translation.en: Not a lot of people know that, especially in the industry,
translation.zh: 并没有人多人知道 尤其是在行内

translation.en: just because it's like…
translation.zh: 因为…

translation.en: I mean, I don't know why. I… [sighs]
translation.zh: 我也不知道为什么 我…

translation.en: It's a process that I'm going through and like discovering myself and…
translation.zh: 我正在经历这样一个过程发现自己 还有…

translation.en: I don't know. Fuck. I don't know.
translation.zh: 我也说不好 操！

translation.en: The industry is just a big… thing, like, for people to know about that.
translation.zh: 在行内这是一件大事 让大家知道这件事

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我也说不好

translation.en: [Mel] When I met Leo, I asked what pronouns he preferred.
translation.zh: 我刚认识里奥的时候我问他希望我用哪个代名词称呼他

translation.en: And he kind of nervously responded quickly, like, "Uh, she/her is fine."
translation.zh: 他紧张地快速回答说“说‘她’就行”

translation.en: He was like, "No one's ever asked me that before."
translation.zh: 他说以前没人问过他

translation.en: [Leo] Like, I just was, like, avoidant.
translation.zh: 我想着就避免这个问题吧

translation.en: But literally, the next day, it was like, "Actually…"
translation.zh: 但是第二天 我说：“其实吧…”

translation.en: She was just like, "Yeah, I'm queer. I get it."
translation.zh: 她说：“嗯 我是酷儿 我明白”

translation.en: To have space to explore those things about myself
translation.zh: 有空间去探索我自己的事

translation.en: alongside somebody who, like, really understands,
translation.zh: 身边有非常理解我的人

translation.en: it was like immediate freedom.
translation.zh: 我就好像立刻获得了自由

translation.en: [Mel] There was one night where he opened up and just poured everything out to me…
translation.zh: 有一天夜里他敞开心扉 把所有的事都向我倾诉

translation.en: …telling me that he was trans and he's known for a really long time
translation.zh: 告诉我他是跨性别者他已经知道了很久

translation.en: but just sort of, like, pushed it down.
translation.zh: 但是压抑着

translation.en: It would be impossible for him to come out because of his career.
translation.zh: 因为他的事业 他不可能出柜

translation.en: And he has to choose between being his authentic self
translation.zh: 他不得不在二者之间作出选择 选择做真的自己

translation.en: and his career that he's worked so hard for.
translation.zh: 还是选择自己如此努力争取的事业

translation.en: [Leo] It got to a point for me where I felt like I'm living a split life.
translation.zh: 后来我觉得自己好像过着分裂的生活似的

translation.en: I know in what space I'm gonna be Lacey and when I can just be me.
translation.zh: 我知道自己在哪里是莱茜 在哪里可以做自己

translation.en: [producer] You afraid of some sort of backlash?
translation.zh: 你怕有不好的后果？

translation.en: [cameraman] Smile for us, sweet ladies.
translation.zh: 笑一下 美女们

translation.en: [cameraman] Right there. Right there.
translation.zh: 那边

translation.en: Nice. Oh, fix the jacket so I can see the Nike.
translation.zh: 非常好 把上衣弄好 让我看到耐克

translation.en: Real quick, for your team.
translation.zh: 很快 为你的队伍

translation.en: -Team official headshot right there. -[camera beeping]
translation.zh: 团队官方肖像照

translation.en: Right. You work it.
translation.zh: 好 你凹一下造型

translation.en: [Alexis] Lee is a good friend of mine that I've known for years
translation.zh: 里是我的好朋友 我们认识多年了

translation.en: but is also internationally known and respected as someone else.
translation.zh: 但是在国际上他以另一个身份为世人所知 受到大家的尊重

translation.en: So it's confusing if I'm talking about "Lee" and "he."
translation.zh: 所以我提到“里”或者“他”的时候就会令人费解

translation.en: I don't want them to, like, miss out on the credit
translation.zh: 我不希望 他失去自己的声誉

translation.en: of, like… [chuckles] …their reputation, basically.
translation.zh: 他失去自己的声誉

translation.en: -Turn around. -[camera shutter clicks]
translation.zh: 转身

translation.en: -[Leo] Sick. -[producer] All right, girls. Yes, girls.
translation.zh: -非常好-好的 姑娘们 非常好 姑娘们

translation.en: All right. Right there.
translation.zh: 好的 很好

translation.en: [Alexis] I can't really imagine how it feels for Lee.
translation.zh: 我无法想象里的感受

translation.en: I mean, even for me, it's just like,
translation.zh: 哪怕是我都觉得

translation.en: "Okay, ladies." Like, it doesn't fit what you're doing.
translation.zh: “女士们”这样的称呼令人感觉并不恰当

translation.en: It feels like you're… been put in this category,
translation.zh: 感觉自己被列入了女士的类别

translation.en: the ladies category. You're like, "No, we're just skateboarders."
translation.zh: 感觉自己被列入了女士的类别 心里想：“不 我们只是滑板手”

translation.en: -[photographer] Give me some… Work it. -[camera shutter clicks]
translation.zh: 凹一下造型

translation.en: I don't want to work it. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我不想凹造型

translation.en: [photographer] AZ, can you make her smile? Someone make her smile.
translation.zh: AZ 你能不能逗她笑一下？谁来逗她笑一下？

translation.en: -Come on, make her smile. -[producer] Yes!
translation.zh: -拜托 逗她笑一下-好！

translation.en: [Leo] So, right now, there's a lot of emphasis on the Olympics.
translation.zh: 现在都很关注奥运

translation.en: And that is so far off from where skateboarding came from.
translation.zh: 从滑板的起源地一路发展而来非常不容易

translation.en: [skater] Slow down! Slow down!
translation.zh: 慢一点！

translation.en: [Alexis] When I started skating in the '90s,
translation.zh: 我在90年代开始玩滑板的时候

translation.en: if you told somebody
translation.zh: 如果你对别人说

translation.en: that skateboarding was gonna be in the Olympics right now,
translation.zh: 滑板将进入奥运会

translation.en: they would laugh in your face and walk away, you know?
translation.zh: 别人会嘲笑你 然后走开

translation.en: You didn't even call yourself an athlete.
translation.zh: 当时都不管自己叫运动员

translation.en: Skateboarding was not a sport. It's like the anti-jock.
translation.zh: 滑板当时并不是体育运动而是反运动狂的

translation.en: It's for everybody. It's a lot more than how it's gonna appear on TV.
translation.zh: 人人可以参与远远超越电视上播的那些

translation.en: [Leo] We were skating because we love it so much…
translation.zh: 我们玩滑板 因为我们热爱

translation.en: …not to win contests.
translation.zh: 不是为了赢得比赛

translation.en: [scoffs] Getting… getting schooled by, like, a 15-year-old.
translation.zh: 被一个15岁的孩子上了一课

translation.en: That time period in our lives, when we were all young,
translation.zh: 我们当时都很年轻

translation.en: and there was no money in it,
translation.zh: 玩那个也赚不到钱

translation.en: and we were just skateboarding 'cause we loved it was super special.
translation.zh: 我们玩滑板因为我们热爱它的与众不同

translation.en: [Lisa] What do you think of that?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: -Wonderful. Yeah. -[Leo] Pretty good?
translation.zh: -非常好 嗯-很好？

translation.en: -Very good. They're experts. -[Leo chuckles]
translation.zh: 非常不错 他们是专家

translation.en: I thought it was only for boys, you know, but I never saw girls doing it.
translation.zh: 我以为只有男孩玩我以前没见女孩玩过

translation.en: That was it. I mean, we're just like little skaters.
translation.zh: 就是这样 我们以前就是小小滑板手

translation.en: -[Leo] What are you doing? -[speaks indistinctly]
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: It's funny because I didn't speak English.
translation.zh: 很有意思 因为我当时还不会说英语

translation.en: And then, the only way we could communicate was, like, punching each other. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我们交流的唯一方式就是互相敲打

translation.en: So that's… that's how we became friends.
translation.zh: 我们就是这样成为了朋友

translation.en: -[Leo] So, what are you doing, Vanessa? -Some fucking shit, dude.
translation.zh: 薇妮莎 你在玩什么呢？ 很他妈疯狂的东西 兄弟

translation.en: Our generation was just all about going out and skating and learning tricks.
translation.zh: 我们那一代就是出去玩滑板 学动作

translation.en: -[Leo] Yes! -[clapping, whistles]
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: [Vanessa] And now there's an objective.
translation.zh: 现在有目标了

translation.en: And with the Olympics, it's like, "Gold."
translation.zh: 进入了奥运会 点石成金了

translation.en: So, are you doing two decimal, or is it on a one to ten?
translation.zh: 是两位数计分吗？ 还是1分到10分？

translation.en: Um, for the park, it will be, uh, zero to a hundred.
translation.zh: 公园赛是0到100计分

translation.en: -Okay, so… -Two decimals.
translation.zh: -好 那…-两位数计分

translation.en: -[Josh] Street should be one decimal. -[Vanessa] One to ten, yeah.
translation.zh: -街式赛应该是一位数计分-1到10

translation.en: That's rad, though.
translation.zh: 不过很好

translation.en: It breaks down all the logistics literally right there underneath, like, each rider.
translation.zh: 在下面把具体情况都分别列出来了

translation.en: You guys know the rules for the trick counting?
translation.zh: 你们知道技巧计数的规则吧？

translation.en: -If you're in a transition, it counts. -[skater] Yeah.
translation.zh: -在弧面里就算-嗯

translation.en: Um, if you haven't tapped your tail on a street trick, it doesn't count.
translation.zh: 表演街式技巧时如果没有踩板尾 就不算

translation.en: Olympics is honestly a language that I don't think any of us know as skateboarders.
translation.zh: 说实话 我们作为滑板手都不懂奥运语言

translation.en: That makes our job really hard,
translation.zh: 这就使我们的工作变得非常困难

translation.en: because it's like, you have a technical trick
translation.zh: 因为有技术性动作

translation.en: and then you just have this fucking massive carcass toss thing.
translation.zh: 还有他妈的高处跳下

translation.en: You know what I mean? So it's like, how do they measure up?
translation.zh: 知道我的意思吧？怎么衡量呢？

translation.en: You need to be pushing boundaries of skateboarding and what is possible.
translation.zh: 需要不断地突破滑板的极限

translation.en: [Josh] Thank you guys for coming out. Super proud to see where we're headed
translation.zh: 谢谢大家过来 看到我们一路朝2020年东京奥运会迈进

translation.en: in this road to Tokyo 2020.
translation.zh: 我感到非常骄傲

translation.en: At its core, skateboarding is so difficult… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 从本质上说 滑板非常难

translation.en: …that anyone that can do it gets the respect.
translation.zh: 任何人会玩滑板 都应当受到尊敬

translation.en: Today, you can pick up a basketball, and you can make a hoop.
translation.zh: 今天你可以拿起一个篮球投篮得分

translation.en: I guarantee you would not be able to ollie in one day.
translation.zh: 我保证你一天学不会豚跳

translation.en: They should be Olympians. They should have gold medals.
translation.zh: 他们应该成为奥运选手应当获得金牌

translation.en: The narrative I hate is that we're lucky to be there.
translation.zh: 有人说能参加奥运是我们幸运我很讨厌这种说法

translation.en: Like, pfft. "You're lucky to have us there."
translation.zh: 我们参加奥运是你们幸运才对

translation.en: Really solid. Had a great mix. Skated the whole course.
translation.zh: 非常棒 组合得非常好整个场地都滑到了

translation.en: She got some flip tricks, skated the rails.
translation.zh: 她做了一些翻板技巧 滑了栏杆

translation.en: The whole kit and caboodle.
translation.zh: 全都做了

translation.en: -How's that? -Good.
translation.zh: -怎么样?-很好

translation.en: [Mimi] The stakes are higher than they've ever been.
translation.zh: 重要程度前所未有

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 对！

translation.en: [Mimi] The competition is stronger than it's ever been.
translation.zh: 竞争的激烈程度前所未有

translation.en: Ultimately, who has the best overall top scores stays on the team.
translation.zh: 最后总分最高的人留在队里

translation.en: [man in audience] Yeah. What's up, boy?
translation.zh: 对 你好 小子

translation.en: I really can't, like, afford in this moment
translation.zh: 现在我真的不能做手术

translation.en: to, like, get surgery and not be able to skate, so…
translation.zh: 现在我真的不能做手术 否则就没办法比赛了

translation.en: They're being asked to do something that's never been done before.
translation.zh: 现在要求他们做的事以前从未有人做过

translation.en: It's like we used to just have these contests that are just spread out
translation.zh: 我们以前的比赛都是分散的

translation.en: maybe three, four times a year, you know?
translation.zh: 一年也许三四次吧

translation.en: And now we have a set schedule that's one back-to-back contest.
translation.zh: 现在我们有固定的日程安排 要连续进行比赛

translation.en: Even when you're skating these contests,
translation.zh: 即便在参加比赛的时候

translation.en: you still have to focus on working out, physical therapy. Everything is work.
translation.zh: 还是要关注训练和理疗 工作占据了全部时间

translation.en: [Mimi] It's a lot to adjust to.
translation.zh: 需要调整适应的方面非常多

translation.en: Even more so for the people that have been in this for a while.
translation.zh: 对于入行久的人来说更是如此

translation.en: [Leo sighs] Definitely getting through this year of competition
translation.zh: 要坚持走完这个比赛年度

translation.en: is just gonna be like,
translation.zh: 我必须把全部精力和能量

translation.en: all of my focus and energy on, like, my physical strength,
translation.zh: 我必须把全部精力和能量 放在我的体能心理健康和滑板能力上

translation.en: my mental health, and, like, my ability to skate.
translation.zh: 放在我的体能心理健康和滑板能力上

translation.en: The impact of making it to the Olympics would be pretty big,
translation.zh: 参加奥运会的影响将非常大

translation.en: and I'm in a position where I could potentially make it there.
translation.zh: 我现在有这样的机会

translation.en: -Yeah! -Yes!
-And that is time right there. -Amazing.
translation.zh: -时间刚好结束-非常好

translation.en: [Mimi] Lee is a pioneer in the space.
translation.zh: 里是滑板界的先锋

translation.en: Hands down, Lee earned this spot.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问 里的位置是他应得的

translation.en: [Vanessa] Lee is one of the hardest-working people that I know.
translation.zh: 里是我认识的最勤奋的人之一

translation.en: I would love to see… them get there.
translation.zh: 我很希望看到他参加奥运

translation.en: I think that they're totally capable of doing it.
translation.zh: 我认为他完全有能力做到

translation.en: The question is, is their heart in it? You know what I mean?
translation.zh: 问题是他想不想？知道我的意思吗？

translation.en: [Leo] Things occurred to me very late,
translation.zh: 我很晚才意识到这件事

translation.en: which is surprising, considering that I can look back on that
translation.zh: 这很令人惊讶 因为当我回头看的时候

translation.en: and be like, "Oh yeah, all that was there."
translation.zh: 我心想：“是啊 以前一直都是这样”

translation.en: And when I was younger, I remember just being like, "No, like, I'm a boy."
translation.zh: 我年纪小一些的时候我记得我心想：“不 我是男孩”

translation.en: It's like I knew that
translation.zh: 原来我早就知道

translation.en: and then it got lost in the fucking ether of, like, capitalism.
translation.zh: 然后在他妈资本主义苍穹中迷失

translation.en: [Sam] Lee, for years, was the star of women's skating.
translation.zh: 多年来 里一直是女子滑板的明星

translation.en: Anything that was being said about Lee, it was like, "Female, female, female."
translation.zh: 任何关于里的事 都说“女子”

translation.en: And they just, like, branded him.
translation.zh: 给他贴上了标签

translation.en: [Leo] Lacey Baker, long blond hair.
translation.zh: 莱茜·贝克 金色长发

translation.en: They just associated me with that,
translation.zh: 大家将此与我联系在一起

translation.en: like that was some kind of trademark or something,
translation.zh: 就好像这是商标似的

translation.en: but it's never what I wanted.
translation.zh: 但这从来就不是我想要的

translation.en: I remember being in meetings, it was like a conversation amongst adults,
translation.zh: 我记得参加一些会议 成年人对话

translation.en: of them being like, "All the way down to, like, the name."
translation.zh: 他们说：“归根到底是名字”

translation.en: "Lacey Baker. It's so marketable."
translation.zh: “莱茜·贝克 市场很认可”

translation.en: [girl] Hard flip.
translation.zh: 鲨鱼翻板

translation.en: [Leo] "Well, you're on the girls' team. You have to wear girls' clothes."
translation.zh: “你在女队 你得穿女孩的衣服”

translation.en: So, it was lots of pressure to dress more feminine,
translation.zh: 所以有很大的压力要我穿得更女性化

translation.en: and that's when things started getting super uncomfortable.
translation.zh: 这时候就变得非常难受了

translation.en: [Sam] I think it was something every company wanted him to do.
translation.zh: 我想这是每一家公司都要他做的事

translation.en: "Dress this way. Be this way. You're a skater and a punk,
translation.zh: “这样穿 这样做 你是滑板手兼朋克

translation.en: but, like, don't be that weird."
translation.zh: 但不要那么怪异”

translation.en: I would pay to, like, hear someone be like,
translation.zh: 我愿意付钱听别人这样说

translation.en: "So here's the girl we're thinking you should be."
translation.zh: “我们觉得你应该成为这样的女孩”

translation.en: [Leo] People were just seeing me as marketable,
translation.zh: 大家觉得我有市场推广的价值

translation.en: wearing all these women's clothes to sell a product.
translation.zh: 要我穿女性服装 就为了销售产品

translation.en: They're just like, "Oh, just change this one thing about yourself."
translation.zh: 他们说：“你这方面改变一下

translation.en: "Just change this one thing." And I'm like,
translation.zh: 就改变这一点” 我心想：“如果我改变这一点就能更上一层楼”

translation.en: "If I change that, then I level up."
translation.zh: 我心想：“如果我改变这一点就能更上一层楼”

translation.en: And I'm just like, "This means I get to skate."
translation.zh: 我心想“这意味着我可以继续玩滑板”

translation.en: I mean, I was so young. How could I even see?
translation.zh: 我当时那么年轻 能懂什么呢？

translation.en: -[Leo] What are you doing? -[Mel] Putting socks on.
translation.zh: -你在干什么？-穿袜子

translation.en: Thinking about stealing one of your shirts.
translation.zh: 想着偷一件你的汗衫

translation.en: [Leo] Okay, go ahead.
translation.zh: 好的 拿吧

translation.en: Maybe this one. [Leo] That one's dirty, but you can wear it.
translation.zh: -要不就这件吧-这件脏的 不过你可以穿

translation.en: [Mel] When he's at home, he's started to feel this acceptance
translation.zh: 他在家里的时候在酷儿群体中开始感觉到被接受

translation.en: within the queer community, like, "I can be who I am,"
translation.zh: 他在家里的时候在酷儿群体中开始感觉到被接受 心想可以做自己了

translation.en: and then goes to work
translation.zh: 然后去工作

translation.en: or goes to shoot a video or travel to do a contest or whatever,
translation.zh: 去拍视频或者去外地参加比赛

translation.en: -and there's so much emphasis… -[cheering] …on the fact that he's a "female" skater.
translation.zh: 各方会强调他是“女子”滑板手

translation.en: And for someone's profession to focus around what your gender is,
translation.zh: 如果你的职业对你的性别非常关注

translation.en: and you're not that gender, that's crazy.
translation.zh: 而你却并不是这种性别 那简直是疯了

translation.en: He's like, "I've worked my whole to get here."
translation.zh: 他觉得：“我一辈子努力才有了今天

translation.en: "I'm finally able to support myself doing what I love,
translation.zh: 我终于能自力更生 做自己爱做的事

translation.en: and I can't throw it away because I need to come out as trans."
translation.zh: 我不能因为要以跨性别者的身份出柜而抛弃这一切”

translation.en: To see him go through this is…
translation.zh: 看到他这么挣扎

translation.en: I can't do anything to fix it, and that, I think, is the hardest part.
translation.zh: 我却毫无办法 我觉得这是最难受的

translation.en: [Leo] Right now, I'm on this journey of what's gonna work for me.
translation.zh: 现在我在想办法摸索、适应

translation.en: I'm trying to be comfortable in my body.
translation.zh: 努力让自己感到舒适

translation.en: I'm 27 now, and it's been a long process to even get to this place,
translation.zh: 我今年27岁了一路走到这一步 经历了很多

translation.en: but I'm just at the beginning of the road still.
translation.zh: 但我依然刚刚踏上旅途

translation.en: If I was living a different life,
translation.zh: 如果我过另一种生活

translation.en: I might just transition and move to a new city
translation.zh: 我可能直接转换性别搬去一座新的城市

translation.en: and live happily ever after.
translation.zh: 然后幸福地生活

translation.en: But I'm in a space where I have to have a conversation about it with the world,
translation.zh: 但我现在所处的位置要求我与世界谈论这件事

translation.en: and I don't want to.
translation.zh: 但我不希望这样

translation.en: This is my high school right here.
translation.zh: 我的高中就在这里

translation.en: When we had half days, we would skate behind this Albertsons.
translation.zh: 只上半天课的时候我们会在超市后面玩滑板

translation.en: There's just, like, flat ground around there.
translation.zh: 那边都是平地

translation.en: We'd go and, like, skate after school sometimes.
translation.zh: 放学之后 我们有时候会去玩滑板

translation.en: [Vanessa] Adolescence and skateboarding is, like, all about loading docks.
translation.zh: 青春期和玩滑板最喜欢装卸码头了

translation.en: -Dude, yeah. Kickflip everything. -[Vanessa] Let me see what I can… What's the highest thing that I can jump off of?
translation.zh: -是啊 我能在任何地方翻板-想想我最高能从哪里跳下来？

translation.en: Now it's, what's the lowest thing that I can skate?
translation.zh: 而现在会想我最低能在哪里玩滑板？

translation.en: [Leo] Yeah, definitely.
translation.zh: 对 没错

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人在吗？

translation.en: -Hey, Mom. -[Donna] Hi!
translation.zh: -妈妈好-你好啊！

translation.en: -[Leo] Hi, Mama. -Hi.
translation.zh: -妈妈好-你好

translation.en: -[Vanessa] Smells like home. -How are you?
translation.zh: -家的味道-你好啊

translation.en: -[Vanessa] Hi. How are you doing? -I'm good. How are you?
translation.zh: -妈妈好 你还好吗？-我很好 你呢？

translation.en: Oh, I love you so much.
translation.zh: 我好爱你

translation.en: -[Vanessa] Good to see you. -[Donna] I missed you.
translation.zh: -见到你真好-我想你了

translation.en: [Vanessa] Well, it looks great in here, Ma.
translation.zh: 家里看起来很不错啊 妈

translation.en: [Leo] Oh my God. There's so much stuff in here. Oh my God!
translation.zh: 哇！这里有好多东西 哇！

translation.en: -I can't believe this, dude. -[Vanessa] Oh my--
translation.zh: -真不敢相信 哇！-哇！

translation.en: -Who in the… -I've known you this long.
translation.zh: 我认识你这么久了

translation.en: -[Vanessa] Babies. -[Leo] Dude, look at this poster.
translation.zh: -宝贝们-哎 看看这张海报

translation.en: [Donna] That was your first poster you were ever put on.
translation.zh: 这是你贴出来的第一张海报

translation.en: "Kickflips and fish sticks." Like, what is that? [chuckles]
translation.zh: “尖翻与鱼柳” 这是什么啊？

translation.en: These are the shoes that Lacey was wearing
translation.zh: 这是2008年坦帕业余赛

translation.en: when she made it into the semis at the Tampa Am in 2008.
translation.zh: 莱茜进入半决赛时穿的鞋子

translation.en: -Wait, those are sick-ass shoes. -My mom--
translation.zh: -哎 这鞋真不错-我妈…

translation.en: Every time I heard people referring to him as Lee,
translation.zh: 每次我听到别人叫他“里”的时候

translation.en: I'm just like, "Why can't I do that?" It just… I want to do it so bad.
translation.zh: 我心想：“为什么我做不到？”我非常希望自己能做到

translation.en: -That is Evan. -[Leo] Oh my God, I need that.
translation.zh: -这是埃文-哎呀 我要这个

translation.en: Because I know she's a boy.
translation.zh: 因为我知道她是男孩

translation.en: He's a boy.
translation.zh: 他是男孩

translation.en: I will get it. I will.
translation.zh: 我会做到的 一定会

translation.en: Who made this? Mom, who made this?
translation.zh: 这是谁做的？妈 这是谁做的？

translation.en: -I have no idea. -It is elaborate.
translation.zh: -我不知道-很精致

translation.en: [Leo] Someone made a serious scrapbook.
translation.zh: 做得好用心的一本剪贴簿

translation.en: Look what it says on the back. -Skateboard Princess. -Wow.
translation.zh: 看看后面写了什么 滑板公主

translation.en: Dude. I should change my Instagram handle to this.
translation.zh: 哎 我应该把我的Instagram用户名改成这个

translation.en: [Vanessa] Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Welcome to Northview High School's Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony.
translation.zh: 欢迎参加北景高中名人堂入堂仪式

translation.en: The first inductee epitomizes a Hall of Fame candidate.
translation.zh: 第一位入选者是名人堂候选者的典型

translation.en: USA Skateboarding National Team member for the 2020 Olympics.
translation.zh: 2020年奥运会美国滑板国家队成员

translation.en: Her accomplishments are staggering.
translation.zh: 她成就斐然

translation.en: [Leo] What's up? Yeah.
translation.zh: 你好 嗯

translation.en: -Thanks for having me. How you doing? -I'm doing well.
translation.zh: -谢谢邀请我来 你还好吗？-非常好

translation.en: -Cool. Nice to see you. -Congratulations on everything.
translation.zh: -太好了-祝贺啊

translation.en: Thanks so much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: We're lucky. We don't have a lot of, uh, stand-out females,
translation.zh: 我们很幸运我们这里的杰出女性并不多

translation.en: but the two we have… [exhales] …you and Tatiana…
translation.zh: 但我们仅有的两位 你和塔蒂阿娜…

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -嗯-嗯

translation.en: It's nice to have two world-class athletes around.
translation.zh: 有两位世界级运动员来这里真是太好了

translation.en: -Cool, man, thanks. -Yeah. Have fun in the Olympics.
translation.zh: -好的 谢谢-祝你参加奥运开心

translation.en: -[Donna] That was awkward. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 好尴尬

translation.en: I'm like, "Yeah…"
translation.zh: 我不断地说“嗯”

translation.en: It's just super awkward to be referred to as female.
translation.zh: 被人称作女性 真是特别尴尬

translation.en: It just feels really weird.
translation.zh: 感觉非常奇怪

translation.en: What do you think is in here?
translation.zh: 你说这里面是什么？

translation.en: [Leo] Oh my God. So good to see you guys.
translation.zh: 哎 见到你们真好！

translation.en: -[man] I know. -Check it out. Look at you.
translation.zh: -没错-看看 看看你

translation.en: [laughing] Oh fuck. That's so crazy.
translation.zh: 操！好夸张

translation.en: Aw, look how cute you were.
translation.zh: 看看你多可爱

translation.en: You still are, but like, you were such a little cutie.
translation.zh: 你现在还是很可爱不过你当时真是个小可爱

translation.en: Well, the shop wouldn't be anything if it wasn't for the actual skateboarders,
translation.zh: 要不是有这么多滑板手这家店就一文不值

translation.en: and that's been a part of it.
translation.zh: 滑板手是这家店的一部分

translation.en: All the kids come in to hang out and stuff
translation.zh: 孩子们都来玩

translation.en: 'cause there's, like, not many places to be around here in Covina.
translation.zh: 因为科维纳没多少玩的地方

translation.en: -Staying out of trouble's kind of hard. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -不惹麻烦也不太容易-嗯

translation.en: So this place gives you, like, more of a home,
translation.zh: 所以这里有家的感觉

translation.en: 'cause us kids that skateboard come from broken homes, right?
translation.zh: 因为我们这些玩滑板的孩子都来自破碎的家庭 对吧？

translation.en: It's just like our family.
translation.zh: 这里就像是我们的家一样

translation.en: Yeah. [chuckles] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [Donovon] Trying to make the most of it.
translation.zh: 尽力而为

translation.en: That was always the thing about skateboarding.
translation.zh: 这一向是滑板的精髓所在

translation.en: We would be able to go skate. We could forget about all the troubles we already have at home.
translation.zh: 我们去玩滑板就能忘记家里的所有烦恼

translation.en: [Leo] The Covina skateboarding community, that's what saved my life.
translation.zh: 是科维纳的滑板群体救了我的命

translation.en: [Donna] There was a lot of great times, and there was some good times,
translation.zh: 有很多好的时候

translation.en: but there was some bad times. There was some…
translation.zh: 但也有一些糟糕的时候

translation.en: …heartbreak along the way.
translation.zh: 有心碎的时候

translation.en: I say I came out of the 1980s
translation.zh: 1980年代 我有了三个漂亮的孩子

translation.en: with three beautiful children and an addiction to meth.
translation.zh: 1980年代 我有了三个漂亮的孩子 也染上了冰毒毒瘾

translation.en: My mom and dad met in rehab. It's where I was conceived.
translation.zh: 我爸妈是在戒毒所认识的也是在那里怀上了我

translation.en: [Donna] When I had Lacey, I was in treatment.
translation.zh: 我怀莱茜的时候 还在接受治疗

translation.en: And I got home, and not long after, I relapsed.
translation.zh: 回家没多久 我就复吸了

translation.en: And then, um, my sister had locked the door,
translation.zh: 后来我姐把门锁了

translation.en: and they said, "You can't have your babies."
translation.zh: 他们说：“孩子不能给你带”

translation.en: And I could hear Lacey behind the door, crying for me.
translation.zh: 我听见莱茜在门背后哭着要我

translation.en: Calling, "Mommy, Mommy." Banging on the door.
translation.zh: 喊着“妈妈” 不断地用力敲门

translation.en: I mean, how can I get that out of my head, ever?
translation.zh: 这种事怎么忘得了呢？

translation.en: [Leo] I just feel like I missed out on so much time with my family.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己错失了那么多家庭时光

translation.en: My dad was a rock star in bands and very talented.
translation.zh: 我爸是一个乐队摇滚明星非常有天赋

translation.en: Also, he was a junkie.
translation.zh: 他也是一个瘾君子

translation.en: So, you know, it was a rocky road.
translation.zh: 所以这条路非常坎坷

translation.en: It cut his life short. I mean, he died, like, young.
translation.zh: 这也造成他短寿 他很年轻就去世了

translation.en: [Donna] End up having to put them through foster care.
translation.zh: 结果不得不送他们去寄养

translation.en: [Leo] I think I was three years old,
translation.zh: 我当时应该是三岁

translation.en: and I'd stand outside and watch my two foster brothers skate.
translation.zh: 我会站在外面 看两个义兄玩滑板

translation.en: I would skate all the time and try to learn how to kickflip.
translation.zh: 我总会去玩滑板 努力学习尖翻动作

translation.en: I love this photo.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢这张照片

translation.en: [Donna] Which one is that?
translation.zh: 哪一个？

translation.en: Where it's my third birthday and you're there standing next to me.
translation.zh: 我三岁生日 你站在我身旁

translation.en: Helping you blow out the candles?
translation.zh: 帮你吹蜡烛？

translation.en: [Leo] Yeah, and I'm like so little.
translation.zh: 对 我好小啊

translation.en: -How cute am I? -Teeny tiny.
translation.zh: -我多可爱啊？-小小个儿

translation.en: -You were cute. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 你好可爱

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: My mom tried her absolute best to, like, get her shit together,
translation.zh: 我妈竭尽全力振作起来

translation.en: and she did, you know?
translation.zh: 她做到了

translation.en: Camera real quick, Mom! Ah!
translation.zh: 快拍 妈！

translation.en: [Donna] I'm videoing, taping, or whatever.
translation.zh: 我在录像、拍摄

translation.en: My mom got us back, and so I was, like, living at home.
translation.zh: 我妈把我们接了回来所以我回家里住了

translation.en: Adjust.
translation.zh: 调整一下

translation.en: We hardly had anything, but, you know, she kept me skating
translation.zh: 我们当时很穷 但是她让我继续玩滑板

translation.en: because it made me happy.
translation.zh: 因为这能给我带来快乐

translation.en: [Leo] My mom would drive me to competitions once a month.
translation.zh: 我妈会每月一次开车送我去参加比赛

translation.en: -That was a majority of my teen years. -[Donna cheers] Lacey!
translation.zh: 这是我少年时代的主要时光

translation.en: [Leo] Then I got sponsored.
translation.zh: 然后我得到了赞助

translation.en: -Oh wow. -These are all of the T-shirts.
translation.zh: -哇！-T恤衫都在这里

translation.en: [Leo] Oh yeah, from… My mom collected all the T-shirts
translation.zh: 对 我妈把T恤衫都收集起来了

translation.en: from the Damn Am and Tampa Am series anytime we'd go.
translation.zh: 我们去丹姆业余赛和坦帕业余赛系列比赛拿到的

translation.en: This you got at a Super Girl, and you were like,
translation.zh: 这件是你在超级女孩比赛上拿到的

translation.en: "Yeah, no. I'm never gonna rock that stuff."
translation.zh: 你当时说：“嗯 不行我永远不会穿这件”

translation.en: [Donna] Like, nine months out of the year, we were on an airplane.
translation.zh: 一年中九个月 我们都在坐飞机

translation.en: It was hard having the responsibility sometime as being manager.
translation.zh: 承担作为经理人的责任有时候很不容易

translation.en: Something would not go right over the weekend,
translation.zh: 如果周末出什么问题

translation.en: and I'd get home and get a phone call. Like, "Why wasn't she wearing this and didn't have this on?"
translation.zh: 然后我回家会接到电话“她为什么不穿这个不穿那个？”

translation.en: And that's where, I think, a lot of the tension came
translation.zh: 我想这就是关系紧张的来源

translation.en: because I did find myself making sure,
translation.zh: 因为我会说

translation.en: "Okay. You got stickers, right? You got your T-shirts, right? Got this?"
translation.zh: “好的 贴纸拿到了 对吧？T恤衫拿到了 对吧？”

translation.en: And, God, I didn't wanna be that person.
translation.zh: 天哪！我不想当恶人

translation.en: I didn't wanna be that mom.
translation.zh: 我不想当这样的妈妈！

translation.en: Because Ant and I went that day. We were all taking photos of you guys.
translation.zh: 因为我们那天去了我们都在给你拍照片

translation.en: [Leo] I had my dreams that I wanted to fulfill,
translation.zh: 我当时想实现自己的梦想

translation.en: but there was also my financial situation at home, like…
translation.zh: 但我们家的财务状况不太好

translation.en: My mom wasn't exactly thriving.
translation.zh: 我妈当时不太顺利

translation.en: She was, like, injured and, like, on workman's comp and shit.
translation.zh: 她当时受了伤 依靠工伤补偿生活

translation.en: And so, like, a lot of the income was, like, on my skating.
translation.zh: 所以很多收入要靠我玩滑板来赚

translation.en: First big, grown-up trip.
translation.zh: 第一次大型成年人旅行

translation.en: [Leo] In 2008, at the Maloof Money Cup, I won $25,000.
translation.zh: 2008年马洛夫金钱杯我赢了2.5万美元

translation.en: That's what we lived on.
translation.zh: 我们就靠这个生活

translation.en: [Alex] If Leo had a choice when they were younger,
translation.zh: 如果里奥以前可以选择的话

translation.en: they would have never entered all these contests,
translation.zh: 他不会参加这些比赛

translation.en: but, up until recently, there wasn't an option
translation.zh: 但是在过去女性滑板手想要从事滑板事业

translation.en: for women skateboarders to have a career outside of competition.
translation.zh: 除参加比赛之外别无选择 该情况在近期才有所改变

translation.en: [Leo] No brands really took girls skating seriously for many years.
translation.zh: 多年来没有哪个品牌真正把女子滑板当回事

translation.en: So, it was like, if I win the one competition a year…
translation.zh: 所以如果我在一年一度的比赛中获胜…

translation.en: [announcer] Okay…
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Leo] …that was like the only way to win some money.
translation.zh: …这是赚点钱的唯一方法

translation.en: -[man] Second place. -[Donna] Second!
translation.zh: -第二名-第二！

translation.en: This was Leo's ticket out.
translation.zh: 这是里奥出人头地的门票

translation.en: Leo was willing to go along with whatever needed to happen
translation.zh: 里奥愿意竭尽全力赚钱生存

translation.en: to make money to survive and to be a skateboarder.
translation.zh: 里奥愿意竭尽全力赚钱生存 成为一名滑板手

translation.en: -[Leo] Are there more of these somewhere? -[Donna] Mmm…
translation.zh: 别的地方还有这样的照片吗？

translation.en: [Leo] It's amazing to look back at all this stuff.
translation.zh: 现在回看这些东西真是太棒了

translation.en: I've gone through many a transformation.
translation.zh: 我经历了很多转变

translation.en: [Leo] Have you tried it ever before?
translation.zh: 你以前试过吗？

translation.en: Like that. Like really grab my arms.
translation.zh: 这样 抓紧我的手臂

translation.en: -Just stomp it. -[girl] Ready.
translation.zh: -用力踩-准备好了

translation.en: -[Leo] Whoo! We're just gonna go. Go! -[girl] You ready?
translation.zh: -我们要开始了 开始！-准备好了

translation.en: -[Leo sighs] Do you wanna take a break? -[girl] Uh, three time's a charm.
translation.zh: -你要休息一下吗？-第三次准行

translation.en: All right, we're going. Three time's a charm.
translation.zh: 好的 来吧 第三次准行！

translation.en: -[girl] Thank you so much. -You're welcome.
translation.zh: -非常感谢-不客气

translation.en: How many days have you been skating?
translation.zh: 你玩滑板多少天了？

translation.en: [Leo] I felt a lack of inclusivity.
translation.zh: 我当时感到缺乏包容性

translation.en: I felt like I didn't belong in skateboarding,
translation.zh: 感到自己不属于滑板运动

translation.en: like there was no space for me.
translation.zh: 感觉没有我的空间

translation.en: And I know that there are other skaters that feel this.
translation.zh: 我知道还有其他滑板手有同样的感受

translation.en: I wanna do more events like this, get more people involved.
translation.zh: 我要做更多这样的活动让更多人参与进来

translation.en: Create our own industry or something, you know?
translation.zh: 创造我们自己的行业

translation.en: Just like queer skate industry.
translation.zh: 酷儿滑板业

translation.en: [Leo] Hello, everyone.
translation.zh: 大家好

translation.en: Thank you for coming to my event that we're all here. Whatever. Um…
translation.zh: 感谢大家来参加我的活动 我们都来到了这里 随便吧

translation.en: [skater] We'll go around really quick. Just share your name,
translation.zh: 我们快速自我介绍一下 说一下自己的名字、代名词

translation.en: pronouns, and one word that, uh, kind of describes, uh,
translation.zh: 说一下自己的名字、代名词 再用一个词描述你来这里的感受

translation.en: you know, how you are coming to the space right now.
translation.zh: 再用一个词描述你来这里的感受

translation.en: I'm Gigi. I use she/her pronouns and, um…
translation.zh: 我叫吉吉 我的代名词是“她” 然后…

translation.en: [sucks teeth] …jazz.
translation.zh: 就这样

translation.en: I use he/him pronouns, um, privately, not really publicly right now.
translation.zh: 我的代名词是“他”现在是私下这样用 公开场合不是

translation.en: Yeah, and I'm excited to actually learn how to facilitate learning on the skateboard,
translation.zh: 学习如何教玩滑板 我很开心

translation.en: and I'm excited to be sharing this space with everyone here,
translation.zh: 我很愿意与各位分享这个空间

translation.en: so thanks for coming.
translation.zh: 感谢大家前来

translation.en: [Leo] I felt really empowered after just saying it.
translation.zh: 光是说出来 我就感到很有力量

translation.en: And it made me think, "Well, maybe I can,
translation.zh: 这让我思考 “也许我可以公开地谈论自己的性别认同

translation.en: you know, just, like, publicly talk about my gender identity
translation.zh: “也许我可以公开地谈论自己的性别认同

translation.en: and, like, what I've felt my whole life."
translation.zh: 说出我一直以来的感受”

translation.en: I hope Lee comes out. I hope they tell the world they're trans.
translation.zh: 我希望里出柜 我希望他告诉全世界自己是跨性别者

translation.en: You know what that would do for me, personally? Just being like,
translation.zh: 知道这对我个人会有什么影响吗？

translation.en: shit, like, that's what we need, is someone who's got a big platform
translation.zh: 妈的 这是我们需要的 有巨大影响力的人说“这没什么大不了”

translation.en: to be like, "It's chill."
translation.zh: 有巨大影响力的人说“这没什么大不了”

translation.en: Like, it's chill.
translation.zh: 没什么大不了

translation.en: Like… that would change the game.
translation.zh: 这会改变一切

translation.en: -[upbeat music playing] -[crowd clamoring]
translation.zh: （2019年6月） （世界骄傲 纽约市 石墙50周年）

translation.en: [Mel] You want to talk to me about this outfit you have going on?
translation.zh: 要说说你穿的这身衣服吗？

translation.en: I don't know. Just feels good.
translation.zh: 我也说不好 感觉很好

translation.en: [Sam] Lee had kind of just found his stride in, like…
translation.zh: 里似乎找到了自己的节奏

translation.en: You can tell he was feeling this, like, masculinity.
translation.zh: 看得出他感觉有男子气概

translation.en: It was really empowering and cool.
translation.zh: 很自信 很酷

translation.en: He was like, "I'm ready to, like, own this."
translation.zh: 他说：“我已经准备好承认这件事了

translation.en: And he was like, "I want to come into the studio."
translation.zh: 我要来工作室

translation.en: "Let's take a bunch of portraits."
translation.zh: 我们拍一些肖像照片”

translation.en: And we're just taking photos, and I'm like, "This is fucking dope."
translation.zh: 拍照的时候我心想：“这太他妈赞了”

translation.en: But I felt like that was a moment where he was like,
translation.zh: 但是我觉得 在那一刻他仿佛在说

translation.en: "I just don't give a shit anymore."
translation.zh: “我他妈再也无所谓了”

translation.en: [Leo] I wanted to post it because I like it.
translation.zh: 我想发出来 因为我喜欢

translation.en: That was just the first caption that came to mind.
translation.zh: 这是我首先想到的一段文字

translation.en: Yeah, there are so many comments on this shit.
translation.zh: 嗯 这条有好多评论啊

translation.en: I obviously knew that those comments were coming,
translation.zh: 我当然早就知道会有这样的评论

translation.en: so if I was to say, "I want he/him pronouns," publicly,
translation.zh: 如果我说：“我要用“他”作为代名词”

translation.en: the whole world would be like, "Oh my God. You can't skate in these contests."
translation.zh: 全世界大概会说：“神啊！你不能参加这些比赛”

translation.en: The Olympics are in July.
translation.zh: 奥运七月举行

translation.en: It's, like, eight months or so away, something like that.
translation.zh: 还有八个月左右

translation.en: And so I keep telling myself, like, "It's just so close."
translation.zh: 所以我不断对自己说：“很近了

translation.en: "I might as well do it because it's so close."
translation.zh: 我还是说吧 因为已经这么近了”

translation.en: I've been toughing things out for so long, and that's all I know.
translation.zh: （希望你尽快好起来 莱茜） 我已经强忍了这么久

translation.en: And maybe I deserve to, like, pay attention to what my needs are.
translation.zh: 也许我有权关注自己到底需要什么

translation.en: I don't even try because I don't feel like I'm…
translation.zh: 我都没有尝试这样去做因为我觉得自己…

translation.en: …I'm good enough. [exhales]
translation.zh: 我觉得自己不够好

translation.en: [operator] Yes. Hi. How can I help you?
translation.zh: 你好 有什么事能帮你吗？

translation.en: Hi, I wanted to set up an appointment for a consultation for top surgery.
translation.zh: 你好 我想预约乳房切除手术咨询

translation.en: [operator] Do you have your letter?
translation.zh: 你有证明信吗？

translation.en: No, I don't. What do I need a letter from?
translation.zh: 没有 要哪里开的证明信呢？

translation.en: [operator] From your therapist.
translation.zh: 你的治疗医师

translation.en: -Okay. -[operator] Clearing you for surgery.
translation.zh: -好的-证明你可以接受手术

translation.en: Um, do you have a preferred name?
translation.zh: 你希望我们怎么称呼你呢？

translation.en: Nah, Lacey is good.
translation.zh: 没事 叫我“莱茜”就行

translation.en: [operator] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Mel] You don't want them to call you Lee?
translation.zh: 你不要他们叫你“里”吗？

translation.en: [operator] And what is your address so I can register you?
translation.zh: 请提供你的地址 我登记一下

translation.en: I'm sorry. For my preferred name, can you actually have them call me Lee?
translation.zh: 不好意思 关于对我的称呼 能不能让他们叫我“里”？

translation.en: Just L-E-E.
translation.zh: 里面的“里”

translation.en: [operator] Give me a sec. Let me--
translation.zh: 稍等 让我来…

translation.en: Um, can we book that appointment?
translation.zh: 可以预约吗？

translation.en: But also, I have, like, a pretty intense travel schedule,
translation.zh: 但是我的旅行日程安排很忙

translation.en: like, because I compete and travel for, like, skateboarding professionally,
translation.zh: 因为我去外地参加职业滑板比赛

translation.en: and, uh, I was hoping that maybe I could book, like, two or three appointments. Just so that--
translation.zh: 所以我希望能不能预约三个时间？这样就…

translation.en: [operator] I can't. Because I go according to what I have.
translation.zh: 不行 我只能按规定办

translation.en: Based on my next available…
translation.zh: 根据目前的预约情况…

translation.en: [Leo] The moment I discovered that you could get top surgery,
translation.zh: 当我发现可以做乳房切除手术的那一刻

translation.en: seven years ago or something, I've wanted to get it.
translation.zh: 大概是七年前 我当即就想要做

translation.en: But every single month, I'm traveling nonstop for competitions.
translation.zh: 但每个月我都马不停蹄地参加比赛

translation.en: I definitely don't have all the answers for what I'm trying to achieve.
translation.zh: 我要达到什么样的目标我自己也不完全知道

translation.en: [Leo] All right. Is that everything?
translation.zh: 好的 都带上了吗？

translation.en: [Leo] I just, like… I'm taking steps that feel, like, right for me.
translation.zh: 我只是在做自己感觉对的事

translation.en: Kiss. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 亲亲

translation.en: [Leo] I'm excited.
translation.zh: 我很激动

translation.en: I like when we get to go places together and stay in nice hotels.
translation.zh: 我喜欢我们一起出去 住好的酒店

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: And where are we right now?
translation.zh: 我们现在在哪里？

translation.en: We're at the Super Crown in Rio.
translation.zh: 我们在里约的超级皇冠大赛

translation.en: [sportscaster] Baker. Coast-to-coast.
translation.zh: 贝克 完美表现！

translation.en: [Mel] All these people around him were so excited that he was going to the Olympics,
translation.zh: 他将去参加奥运会他周围的人都非常激动

translation.en: his mom, his manager, me, his fans. Any single time he went to an interview,
translation.zh: 他妈妈、他的经纪人、我、他的粉丝 每次他接受访问

translation.en: it was like, "You are going to the Olympics?"
translation.zh: 都会问：“你要去参加奥运了吧？”

translation.en: Whole career became, like, the Olympics.
translation.zh: 他的整个职业生涯现在都围绕着奥运展开

translation.en: I was like, "Do what makes you happy." But also,
translation.zh: 我说：“你怎么开心 就怎么做”

translation.en: "When are you gonna go to the Olympics again?" "That's crazy, you know? Do that, like, if you can."
translation.zh: 但我也说：“你什么时候去奥运？太激动了 可以的话 一定要去”

translation.en: [Leo] Norway.
translation.zh: 挪威

translation.en: London.
translation.zh: 伦敦

translation.en: [Mimi] We basically have no idea where we're gonna go, when we're gonna go.
translation.zh: 我们不知道会去哪里 什么时候去

translation.en: We're in it for the adventure.
translation.zh: 我们在探险

translation.en: [Leo] Spain. Portugal.
translation.zh: 西班牙 葡萄牙

translation.en: Then on the Dew Tour.
translation.zh: 然后参加露水巡回赛

translation.en: [sportscaster 1] That's an easy day for Baker.
translation.zh: 今天对贝克来说很轻松

translation.en: [sportscaster 2] Going for the long nose manual.
translation.zh: 长距离前轮滑行

translation.en: [Leo] Directly after that, I skated Minneapolis.
translation.zh: 之后我直接去明尼阿波利斯参加比赛

translation.en: [sportscaster 3] Making their 14th X Games appearance.
translation.zh: 这是他第14次参加世界极限运动会

translation.en: [Mel] Yeah, so that's been four months of literally nonstop.
translation.zh: 对 已经四个月连续参加比赛了

translation.en: Yeah, it's a lot.
translation.zh: 对 好辛苦

translation.en: We are in Mexico City.
translation.zh: 现在我们在墨西哥城

translation.en: [Leo] I've thought about what would happen if I transitioned
translation.zh: 我考虑过 如果我转换性别会怎么样

translation.en: and how would that affect my relationship with Mel.
translation.zh: 会如何影响我和梅尔的关系

translation.en: The uncertainty of, like, how things will change
translation.zh: 情况会出现如何的不确定性

translation.en: and how we will continue to relate to each other.
translation.zh: 我们的感情如何继续发展

translation.en: [Mel] I mean, there's no way that I would never not be supportive,
translation.zh: 我永远不可能不支持他

translation.en: but it is, like, slightly scary for me.
translation.zh: 但这确实有一点令我害怕

translation.en: And I'm not gonna say I'll feel one way or the other.
translation.zh: 并不是说我一定会有这样或那样的感觉

translation.en: Just… I'll see what happens, I guess.
translation.zh: 并不是说我一定会有这样或那样的感觉 走一步看一步吧

translation.en: [Leo] It would be really hard if we had to break up.
translation.zh: 如果我们不得不分开 那会非常难受

translation.en: That's not what I want.
translation.zh: 我不希望这样

translation.en: But I also wanna be happy and not be, like, avoiding what I need to get done, you know?
translation.zh: 但我也希望自己幸福而不是躲避自己需要做的事

translation.en: I feel like watching those skate videos last night were long overdue for me.
translation.zh: 昨晚我看那些滑板视频我觉得我早就该看了

translation.en: I know. I've been telling you for a long time that I wanted to show you.
translation.zh: 对 我早就跟你说了希望给你看

translation.en: Alexis was like, "You've never seen Welcome to Hell?"
translation.zh: 亚历克西丝说你没看过《欢迎来到地狱》？

translation.en: [Leo] That was like my fucking life. I watched it every day.
translation.zh: 我他妈看了一辈子 我以前每天看

translation.en: [Mel] What did your mom say?
translation.zh: 你妈说什么？

translation.en: She said, "The video is amazing. I gotta admit, I shed a little tear."
translation.zh: 她说：“视频很棒我承认我流了几滴眼泪

translation.en: "The memories flood back. I love Elissa, and I love you."
translation.zh: 往日重现 我爱阿莉莎 我也爱你”

translation.en: Like, "Blech!"
translation.zh: 好恶心

translation.en: Cute.
translation.zh: 真好

translation.en: [Leo yawns] Fuck.
translation.zh: 操！

translation.en: [Mel] After we get back to New York,
translation.zh: 我们回纽约之后

translation.en: you'll have a month until you have to go out again, right?
translation.zh: 你有一个月时间然后再会有比赛 对吧？

translation.en: [Leo] Ten days.
translation.zh: 十天

translation.en: Okay, that's true. That's actually not very much time at all.
translation.zh: 好吧 没错 这也没多少时间

translation.en: [Leo] Oh my God, and then my second appointment.
translation.zh: 哎呀 然后就是我第二次预约

translation.en: [Mel] Oh yeah. That's coming soon.
translation.zh: 噢 对 很快就到了

translation.en: But I just want to ask about how I want the scars to look and stuff.
translation.zh: 但我就想问问我可以怎么安排疤痕的外观

translation.en: [Mel] Mmm. Interesting. I didn't know you could do that.
translation.zh: 这么有意思没想到还能安排疤痕的外观

translation.en: And then you get to pick, like, your nipple size and stuff, I guess.
translation.zh: 应该还可以选择奶头尺寸等等

translation.en: [Mel] Crazy. What size nipple do you want?
translation.zh: 好夸张 你要选择什么尺寸的奶头？

translation.en: -[Leo] Regular. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 普通尺寸？

translation.en: Just so it all looks normal?
translation.zh: 这样看起来会比较正常？

translation.en: [Leo] And then, like, set the date.
translation.zh: 然后就是确定日期

translation.en: [Mel chuckles] Day after Tokyo.
translation.zh: 安排在从东京回来之后

translation.en: [Leo] We're going to the Nike SB video premiere tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚我们要参加耐克滑板视频首映

translation.en: A video part is, like, each skater gets, like, two to three,
translation.zh: 每一位滑板手拍两到四分钟的视频做成视频集锦

translation.en: maybe four minutes of footage. And it's, like, their best street footage.
translation.zh: 每一位滑板手拍两到四分钟的视频做成视频集锦 展现其最好的街头形象

translation.en: I'm so excited. We gotta go.
translation.zh: 我非常激动 我们得走了

translation.en: You ready?
translation.zh: 你准备好了？

translation.en: [Leo] With a video part, you put your soul into it.
translation.zh: 拍视频集锦要全身心投入

translation.en: It's like a reflection of the way you skate. You pick the song.
translation.zh: 表现出你滑板的方式你自己选择歌曲

translation.en: Everything about it is an expression of who you are.
translation.zh: 其中的一切都是在表达你是什么样的人

translation.en: If a competition is like a test, this is like your thesis.
translation.zh: 如果比赛是考试 那这就是论文

translation.en: This is like-- Honestly, like, who are you?
translation.zh: 说实话 这是在展示你是什么样的人

translation.en: [Alex] Shooting a video part is like having a baby
translation.zh: 拍视频集锦就像生小孩

translation.en: but lasts three years, and it's a terrible pregnancy.
translation.zh: 但过去的三年是很恐怖的孕期

translation.en: You bleed for it, you break bones, you snap ligaments.
translation.zh: 流血、骨折、韧带断裂

translation.en: You're putting your whole self out there for everybody to see.
translation.zh: 你把自己的全部展示给大家看

translation.en: It's gnarly.
translation.zh: 很不容易

translation.en: [woman] The average kid, if you go to any skate park
translation.zh: 一般的孩子 你去任何滑板公园问他们

translation.en: and you ask them who won the Olympic qualifier over the weekend,
translation.zh: 你去任何滑板公园问他们 周末奥运资格赛谁赢了

translation.en: uh, nobody's gonna know.
translation.zh: 没人会知道

translation.en: Ultimately, what gets the most reverence in the skate world
translation.zh: 归根结底在滑板世界能得到多少尊重

translation.en: is what you've done on video.
translation.zh: 就是要看你在视频中的表现

translation.en: [Alex] If I think of a video part I connected with,
translation.zh: 我最喜欢的视频集锦

translation.en: Brian Anderson in Welcome to Hell.
translation.zh: 是《欢迎来到地狱》中的布莱恩·安德森

translation.en: He's rolling up at a hubba. He looks like he's gonna kill this ledge.
translation.zh: 他在斜台上滑过来就好像要把台子都砸散了似的

translation.en: Elissa Steamer in Welcome to Hell.
translation.zh: 《欢迎来到地狱》中的艾丽莎·斯迪莫

translation.en: When I was little brat, I'd just watch her part
translation.zh: 我小时候会看她表演

translation.en: and be like, "I could do that. I'll learn that."
translation.zh: 盼着自己也能学会这样的动作

translation.en: [Leo] To, like, have a part in a video that Elissa also has a part in,
translation.zh: 和艾丽莎一起拍视频

translation.en: it's just like, "Fuck."
translation.zh: 真是太他妈不可思议了！

translation.en: How did I get here?
translation.zh: 我怎么走到这一步的？

translation.en: [director] I hope everyone here enjoys the video.
translation.zh: 希望大家都喜欢视频

translation.en: -[woman] Whoo! -And here it is.
translation.zh: 开始播放

translation.en: -[Leo] Yeah! -[all cheering]
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: [Leo] Dude, you ripped!
translation.zh: 兄弟 你太厉害了！

translation.en: I loved your part. Oh my God, I loved your songs. They were rad.
translation.zh: 我太喜欢你的视频了 天哪！ 你的歌我也喜欢 太赞了

translation.en: [Leo] When I'm able to just skate, and especially with queer community,
translation.zh: 我可以尽情地玩滑板尤其是在酷儿群体中

translation.en: because I feel a sense of freedom and connected with myself.
translation.zh: 因为我有了自由的感觉和自我意识

translation.en: -[Leo] Thank you. -[Mimi] I'm so proud of you.
translation.zh: -谢谢-我为你感到骄傲

translation.en: -Everything you do is always beautiful. -[Leo] Aw!
translation.zh: 你做的一切总是那么美

translation.en: -Yeah. -Mimi!
translation.zh: -嗯-咪咪！

translation.en: [Leo] I've been so influenced by sponsors
translation.zh: 这么多年来 我受赞助商的影响很大

translation.en: and, like, being marketable for so many years.
translation.zh: 为了市场而打造自己的形象

translation.en: [Leo] I know! Thanks.
translation.zh: 我知道！谢谢！

translation.en: [Leo] What I really feel like I want right now is to just focus on skating.
translation.zh: 现在我只想把精力关注于滑板

translation.en: Just focusing on a video part
translation.zh: 只关注于视频集锦

translation.en: and never having to compromise for a contest.
translation.zh: 永远不再为一场比赛而妥协

translation.en: There was a time when I was feeling really upset
translation.zh: 曾经有一段时间 我感到非常沮丧

translation.en: and very, like, depressed and disconnected from the industry.
translation.zh: 非常抑郁 感到与滑板界脱节

translation.en: And for a long time, I was trying to escape my skateboarding identity.
translation.zh: 很长一段时间我尝试去逃避自己的滑板身份

translation.en: I just had, like, a bad taste in my mouth.
translation.zh: 五味杂陈

translation.en: [Sam] The big endorsement deals in skateboarding are with the shoe companies.
translation.zh: 滑板运动的大赞助商是鞋品公司

translation.en: Adidas, Nike, Vans, all of--
translation.zh: 阿迪达斯 耐克 范斯 等等

translation.en: Those are the only people that pay you, like, enough to really make a good living.
translation.zh: 只有这些公司出的赞助费才够你过上好的生活

translation.en: They support you with contests, flights, all that sort of stuff.
translation.zh: 他们在比赛、航班等方面支持你

translation.en: So, he was talking to sponsors.
translation.zh: 他以前找赞助商谈

translation.en: He asked for like 500 bucks.
translation.zh: 他要求赞助500美元

translation.en: And they were like, "We just don't have 500 bucks."
translation.zh: 对方说：“我们没有500美元”

translation.en: [sportscaster] Baker has been a dominant force in women's skateboarding.
translation.zh: 贝克一直是女子滑板界的主导力量

translation.en: [Sam] It's like, you have one of the greatest skaters.
translation.zh: 这一位非常杰出的滑板手

translation.en: Female, male, gender, doesn't matter. Just, like, a great skater,
translation.zh: 男性 女性 性别 不去管 就是一位杰出的滑板手

translation.en: winning these contests.
translation.zh: 在各种比赛中获胜

translation.en: I think he went and bought a pair of shoes to win the contest in.
translation.zh: 他好像还自己买了一双鞋然后在比赛中获胜

translation.en: That's fucking insane.
translation.zh: 这太他妈离谱了

translation.en: [Lisa] They were one of the best in the world, winning in all these contests,
translation.zh: 他是世界上最杰出的滑板手之一赢得各种比赛

translation.en: but no one was interested in putting them on the team
translation.zh: 但没人有兴趣让他进队

translation.en: or including them in anything.
translation.zh: 或者让他参与任何事

translation.en: [Leo] I had a career, and then it just went away for some reason.
translation.zh: 我曾经有一个好的职业生涯 然后因为某些原因就没了

translation.en: And I went to school and got a job because I'm like,
translation.zh: 我去上学 找了一份工作 因为我心想：“好吧 没我的份了”

translation.en: "Okay, well, I guess there's nothing for me."
translation.zh: 因为我心想：“好吧 没我的份了”

translation.en: [Donna] When Leo was younger,
translation.zh: 里奥早些年

translation.en: going from long hair to short hair, watching sponsors drop away,
translation.zh: 从长发变短发 看着赞助商离开

translation.en: that was tough.
translation.zh: 非常困难

translation.en: Well, was that gonna be repeated?
translation.zh: 会重复这样的状况吗？

translation.en: It's a whole different level of worry now.
translation.zh: 现在这完全是另一个层级的担忧了

translation.en: [Alexis] When do we have to wear this? Like out there?
translation.zh: 我们在外面什么时候要穿这个？

translation.en: -[Mimi] At the announcement. -So, they only made extra-large?
translation.zh: -宣布的时候-所以只做了特大号？

translation.en: -[indistinct chatter] -What do the boys take? [laughs]
translation.zh: 男生穿什么啊？

translation.en: [Alexis] ♪ It's raining men ♪
translation.zh: 你不能穿这件 不能 这是雨人

translation.en: -What is this? -[chuckling]
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: -Can you get Lee to wear this just today? -I can get Lee to wear it just for today.
translation.zh: -你能让里今天穿这件吗？-可以

translation.en: -[Mimi] That'd be great. That'd be great. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: [announcer] The other return to the team this season, Lee Baker.
translation.zh: 老将里·贝克归队

translation.en: [Alex] The Olympics boils down to who's the king and queen of a sport.
translation.zh: 奥运会归根结底就是看谁是一项运动的王者

translation.en: And by participating in the Olympics, we're adhering to this whole binary thing
translation.zh: 奥运会坚持二元化

translation.en: of like, "There's only women and men,"
translation.zh: 只分女子或者男子

translation.en: when, in fact, we know there's a whole spectrum of genders
translation.zh: 但实际上我们知道性别有一个很广泛的光谱

translation.en: and that a lot of skateboarders don't identify as a male or female,
translation.zh: 许多滑板手不认为自己是男性或女性

translation.en: and they wanna skate and participate at this elite level too.
translation.zh: 他们也想玩滑板也想参与到精英级别的比赛之中

translation.en: But then they have to pick a gender in order to skate.
translation.zh: 但为了参与滑板运动他们就不得不选择一个性别

translation.en: [Leo] In competitions, I just get so stripped
translation.zh: 在比赛中 我自己的一切和我的本质都被剥夺了

translation.en: of everything about me that makes me who I am.
translation.zh: 我自己的一切和我的本质都被剥夺了

translation.en: Like, I just get lost in, like, what everyone wants for me.
translation.zh: 我迷失在大家对我的要求之中

translation.en: There's all these factors at play. My sponsors.
translation.zh: 有许多因素在起作用 我的赞助商

translation.en: What's good for my career. What everyone thinks is gonna be best.
translation.zh: 怎么样有利于我的职业生涯 大家觉得怎么样最好

translation.en: "Oh, but the Olympics is so cool."
translation.zh: “噢 但是奥运会非常棒

translation.en: "It's the first one ever. This is skateboarding history."
translation.zh: 这是史上第一次这是在创造滑板的历史”

translation.en: All of these voices that are just nonstop.
translation.zh: 这些声音一刻不停

translation.en: "Olympics. Olympics. Olympics."
translation.zh: “奥运”

translation.en: [operator] You have reached Housing Works Health Services Department.
translation.zh: 这里是“居家工程”健康服务部

translation.en: If this is a life-threatening emergency, please hang up and call 911.
translation.zh: 如果有威胁生命的紧急事件请挂机并拨打911

translation.en: Otherwise, someone will be right with you. Thank you.
translation.zh: 否则 稍后将有人接听你的电话 谢谢

translation.en: [Leo] It's like, "How many fucking years am I gonna put this off?" You know?
translation.zh: 我心想：“我他妈还要拖多少年啊？” 对吧？

translation.en: How much longer do I have to do this for before I like…
translation.zh: 我还要这样忍多久 然后…

translation.en: I don't know, maybe forever, you know.
translation.zh: 我也说不好然后也许就再也没机会了

translation.en: And everyone's like, "It's the Olympics. It's just one year."
translation.zh: 大家都说：“这是奥运啊 就一年”

translation.en: If I wait one more year, there might not be any more Leo.
translation.zh: 如果我再等一年 可能没有里奥了

translation.en: There's just like no escaping the dysphoria.
translation.zh: 无法摆脱这种烦躁不安的感觉

translation.en: Just like, my skin's crawling.
translation.zh: 生不如死

translation.en: Like right now it is, talking about it.
translation.zh: 现在就是这样

translation.en: [sighs] Like going to the doctors and shit,
translation.zh: 去看医生

translation.en: trying to get the letters for my top surgery
translation.zh: 想方设法拿乳房切除手术的证明信

translation.en: and, like, that process…
translation.zh: 这个过程

translation.en: Like, one doctor said no to the writing the letter,
translation.zh: 有一个医生拒绝写证明信

translation.en: and it just, like, fucking destroyed me, because I'm just like, "Dude, please."
translation.zh: 简直他妈把我打垮了 我心想：“兄弟 拜托

translation.en: Like, "Just… just give me the letter."
translation.zh: 求你给我写吧”

translation.en: Like, the clock is just ticking.
translation.zh: 时间在一分一秒地过去

translation.en: -[operator] How may I help you today? -Hi.
translation.zh: 今天有什么能帮你的吗？ 你好 我打电话来

translation.en: I'm calling because it says
translation.zh: 你好 我打电话来 因为显示我的保险网络里有“居家工程”

translation.en: that, uh, Housing Works is in my network for insurance.
translation.zh: 因为显示我的保险网络里有“居家工程”

translation.en: [operator] I have to reach over to some other staff members.
translation.zh: 我得问一下其他同事

translation.en: It may take a while because we have a dozen or so numbers,
translation.zh: 可能要花一点时间 因为有十几个人

translation.en: and we have to dial down the list and get one of them to answer.
translation.zh: 我们得按名单安排同事答复

translation.en: -So just give me a moment. -All right.
translation.zh: -稍等-好的

translation.en: [Leo] I wish that I just wasn't here doing this.
translation.zh: 我不希望自己在这里做这样的事

translation.en: Then I'm like, "No, I have to, like, skate,
translation.zh: 但是我心想：“不行 我得玩滑板

translation.en: and I have to show up for, like, my mom and the community and all this stuff."
translation.zh: 为了我妈 为了集体等等 我得出现”

translation.en: You know, but sometimes I actually just want to fucking die, so…
translation.zh: 但有时候其实我真想他妈死了算了

translation.en: That's like… That's it. [sighs]
translation.zh: 就是这样

translation.en: [woman over phone] No choice will ever be harder than this one.
translation.zh: 没有哪个选择会比这个选择更困难

translation.en: I… I just… I can't get myself to, like, be like, "I'm done."
translation.zh: 我没办法让自己肯定地说：“不干了”

translation.en: I just feel like I have to, you know?
translation.zh: 我只是觉得必须这样做

translation.en: Like I feel like making the decision not to compete anymore
translation.zh: 我觉得作出不参加奥运会的决定

translation.en: or, like, go for the Olympics is, like, actually super emotional.
translation.zh: 我觉得作出不参加奥运会的决定 其实非常情绪化

translation.en: [Yulin] So, does that mean you are gonna pull out then?
translation.zh: 所以你的意思是你要退出？

translation.en: [sportscaster] Tonight, eight of the best women skateboarders in the world
translation.zh: 今晚全球八位最出色的女子滑板手

translation.en: will be embarking on the path to the 2020 Olympic Games in Tokyo, Japan.
translation.zh: 将踏上2020年日本东京奥运会的征程

translation.en: [announcer] Make some noise right here for Lacey Baker!
translation.zh: 莱茜·贝克本尊！

translation.en: I don't know. I feel so happy when I go skate, you know?
translation.zh: 我也说不好玩滑板的时候 我感到非常开心

translation.en: Like, every time.
translation.zh: 每次都是

translation.en: It feels so good.
translation.zh: 感觉非常好

translation.en: And I come in this space, and I just feel so not good.
translation.zh: 来到这里 我感觉非常不好

translation.en: There's a wound inside of me that just keeps getting poked
translation.zh: 我内心的伤口不断地被戳动

translation.en: anytime they're like, "Okay, ladies!" Or like, "This is the women's semifinal!"
translation.zh: 每次听见“好的 女士们”或者“这是女子半决赛！”

translation.en: Just, like, poking at this part of me that's just like… [scoffs] …like, just so done.
translation.zh: 戳我的这个部分 令我精疲力尽

translation.en: [echoing] I'm just trying to live my life outside of my head.
translation.zh: 我努力地过活 不去思考

translation.en: And like, go to the skate park, and half the people are calling me Lacey.
translation.zh: 去滑板公园 一半的人叫我莱茜

translation.en: The other half are calling me Lee, and I just want to skate,
translation.zh: 另一半叫我里 我只想玩滑板

translation.en: but I can't even focus because it's like…
translation.zh: 但我甚至没办法集中注意力

translation.en: There's too much noise in my head about, like,
translation.zh: 因为我的脑子里有太多杂音

translation.en: who the fuck I'm supposed to be in that moment.
translation.zh: 在那一刻 我他妈到底应该是谁？

translation.en: -[Cher] Hi! [speaks indistinctly] -Oh my God.
translation.zh: -你好啊 里-天哪！

translation.en: I wanna show you raw clips.
translation.zh: 我给你看我的翻板动作

translation.en: Was it too long?
translation.zh: 是不是太长了？

translation.en: -What? -[Leo] Okay.
translation.zh: -什么？-好

translation.en: [Stephen] You're so stupid. Shut up.
translation.zh: 你好傻 闭嘴

translation.en: Was the grind too long?
translation.zh: 碾磨是不是太长了？

translation.en: Oh my God. I love your--
translation.zh: 我很喜欢你的笑声

translation.en: Tell me how you feel about this outfit. Be honest.
translation.zh: 说实话 你觉得这身衣服怎么样？

translation.en: This outfit's sick as hell.
translation.zh: 这身衣服非常好

translation.zh: 在吗？

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: -[Leo] Hi. -Oh, hello, puppy.
translation.zh: -你好-你好 小狗

translation.en: -We need stickers. -[chuckles] Let's get stickers.
translation.zh: 我们需要贴纸 我们去拿贴纸吧

translation.en: [Stephen] I feel like we should do only Glue stickers, whatever--
translation.zh: 我觉得我们应该只用“黏胶”贴纸…

translation.en: [Leo] Yeah, for sure.
translation.zh: 对 没错

translation.en: [Leo] The way that I felt for a long time about my pre-sponsored self…
translation.zh: 我长久以来对接受赞助之前的那个自己的感受…

translation.en: [Stephen] Gonna look sick.
translation.zh: 这会非常好看

translation.en: [Leo] …it's like I'm just now getting back in touch with that person.
translation.zh: …我现在就像又和那个人联络上了

translation.en: There's no more, uh…
translation.zh: 再也没有…

translation.en: like, facade.
translation.zh: 再也没有伪装

translation.en: [Stephen] Skating, at this point, is a multibillion-dollar industry,
translation.zh: 现在滑板是几十亿美元的产业

translation.en: and you can count on two hands the amount of, like, professionals
translation.zh: 同性恋、酷儿、跨性别者甚至女性职业选手

translation.en: who are, like, gay, queer, trans, or even, like, women also, you know?
translation.zh: 同性恋、酷儿、跨性别者甚至女性职业选手 两只手就数得过来

translation.en: -It's crazy. -[Leo] You can, like, name them all.
translation.zh: -很夸张-都叫得出名字

translation.en: [Cher] Epic Glue party.
translation.zh: “诗史黏胶”派对

translation.en: It's about to start.
translation.zh: 马上就要开始了

translation.en: -[Cher] Oh my God. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 神啊！

translation.en: [Leo] All right, kickflip.
translation.zh: -好 尖翻-好

translation.en: All right. Whoever gets the first kickflip gets a board,
translation.zh: -好 尖翻-好 第一个完成尖翻的人 送一块滑板

translation.en: but you have to do it in 30 seconds.
translation.zh: 但要在30秒内完成

translation.en: [Stephen] All right, we got a winner.
translation.zh: 好 胜者已经产生！

translation.en: I really look up to Leo, honestly.
translation.zh: 说实话 我真的很仰慕里奥

translation.en: Ju, like, the freedom of doing whatever you want
translation.zh: 自由地做自己想做的事

translation.en: and being whoever you want. Not being afraid to show your true self.
translation.zh: 做自己想做的人 不害怕展示真正的自己

translation.en: Dude, they're doing everything. Doing everything they should be doing.
translation.zh: 兄弟 他在做很多事 而且做得很对

translation.en: [Sam] I think Lee's legacy will be bringing some much-needed authenticity to skating.
translation.zh: 我觉得里的传奇将为滑板运动带来其亟需的真实性

translation.en: [Leo] Okay, that's great. Right here. Whoa, turn around.
translation.zh: 好的 非常好 这就对了！ 等一下 转身！

translation.en: Lee becoming so popular and famous and everything just shattered everything.
translation.zh: 里变得如此受欢迎且出名改变了一切

translation.en: [Leo] I know what it's like to, like, not have anyone to look up to.
translation.zh: 我知道没有榜样的滋味

translation.en: But there's trans people everywhere,
translation.zh: 但是到处都有跨性别人士

translation.en: which is something I wish that I knew as a kid.
translation.zh: 要是我小时候知道就好了

translation.en: Everything leading up to right now
translation.zh: 一路发展到现在

translation.en: is one version of being trans,
translation.zh: 这只是作为跨性别者的一个版本

translation.en: but there are so many versions of it.
translation.zh: 但还有许多不同的版本

translation.en: I don't have the answers.
translation.zh: 我没有答案

translation.en: I only have, like, my answers that I've gotten so far.
translation.zh: 我只有至今为止得到的我自己的答案

translation.en: I just think it's really important to have compassion for yourself.
translation.zh: 我觉得对自己保持热情非常重要

translation.en: And that, like, every iteration of yourself counts.
translation.zh: 自己的每一次重复都很重要

translation.en: I'm just, like, one fucking person…
translation.zh: 我只是一个普通人罢了

translation.en: and I just happen to be trans.
translation.zh: 而且刚好是跨性别者

translation.en: And I think that, l just existing should be enough.
translation.zh: 我觉得光是存在就足够了

translation.en: At the end of the day, I'm just a fucking skater, so, like,
translation.zh: 说到底 我只是一个他妈的滑板手

translation.en: I just gonna skate. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 那我就玩滑板呗

translation.en: And, like, enjoy it.
translation.zh: 而且享受其中

translation.en: Because it's like, life is so brief, so I don't wanna waste any more time.
translation.zh: 因为人生如此短暂所以我不想再浪费时间

translation.en: ♪ Hold me till we're home ♪
translation.zh: 字幕翻译：朱音
